basic.floral_language:
Lobelia erinus
Floriography: unique, compact, loyalty 
Lobelia erinus belongs to herbaceous plant. Plant stature is beautiful and often is a ball type. Leaf blade is lanceolar. Flowers are small and unique. Color is mainly violet. Petals 5, part two are smaller, the other three are bigger, so it looks like half of flowers. That is why it was called "flower lobelia". 
Lobelia erinus is long day plants likes sufficient sunshine. Summer lights need to be properly covered. Flowering from January to February, ornamental period 1 to 2 weeks.
basic.blooming: Flowering period July-September, viewing period 1-2 weeks

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate light, long-day plant, shade properly under summer strong light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring
maintenance.pruning: Remove withered flowers, old, diseased, and dead leaves timely
